stories.title: Beautiful Starfield Background
stories.description: The background is currently black/empty - glitter particles are NOT visible. CRITICAL BUG: Camera is at z=8, but particles are at z=5-15 which puts them BEHIND the camera! Fix: Move particles to z=-15 to z=-3 (BEHIND the cards, in front of camera). Spread particles wider (50x50). Make stars MUCH brighter - increase opacity, larger sizes (0.15-0.4 for stars). Add color variation (cyan #22d3ee, purple #a855f7, white). The background should be a beautiful starfield that users notice immediately.
stories.verify: Starfield is clearly visible on black background, magical night sky effect

stories.title: Clean Vertical Options List
stories.description: Replace messy flex-wrap chips with elegant vertical list. Each row has: (1) Cyan numbered badge on left (1, 2, 3), (2) Option text centered, (3) X delete button on right (desktop) or swipe-delete (mobile). Subtle separator lines. Smooth slide-in animations. Scrollable if many items. Header shows 'Your options (4/12)'. Should look like a premium settings list, not scattered pills. Clean typography, good spacing.
stories.verify: Options display as clean numbered list, professional and readable

stories.title: Premium Input Experience
stories.description: Make input field feel premium and inviting: (1) Larger input with better placeholder cycling through examples ('Pizza...', 'Beach vacation...', 'Movie night...' every 3s), (2) Glowing border on focus (cyan), (3) Replace tiny '+' button with pill-shaped 'Add' button that's more obvious, (4) Satisfying micro-animations on add, (5) Clear visual feedback for errors/duplicates. Users should immediately understand how to use it.
stories.verify: Input is obvious, inviting, and delightful to use

stories.title: Irresistible Decide Button
stories.description: The main CTA button must be stunning: (1) Full-width on mobile, prominent size, (2) Beautiful gradient (cyan #22d3ee to purple #a855f7), (3) Gentle pulse/glow animation when ready (2+ options), (4) Sparkle or star icon, (5) Disabled state is clearly muted gray, (6) Satisfying press animation (scale + shadow). Text: 'Let the Vibes Decide âœ¨'. This button should make users excited to click.
stories.verify: Button is beautiful, animated when ready, irresistible to click

stories.title: Smooth State Transitions
stories.description: Polish transitions between app states: (1) Input panel slides down/fades when spinning starts, (2) Add slight anticipation pause (300ms) before winner reveals, (3) Smooth fade-in when returning to input state, (4) Cards merge animation is fluid, (5) No jarring cuts or instant state changes. Use framer-motion for all transitions. The app should flow like butter between states.
stories.verify: All state transitions are smooth and polished, no jarring changes

stories.title: Mobile Excellence
stories.description: Perfect the mobile experience (test at 375px): (1) Touch targets min 44px, (2) Input panel doesn't block too much scene (max 40% of screen), (3) Text readable without zoom, (4) Reduce particles on mobile for performance, (5) Safe area insets respected, (6) Swipe gestures feel native, (7) No horizontal overflow. Mobile users are primary - this must feel like a native app.
stories.verify: Mobile experience is flawless, feels like native app
